name: Critical - Production
email_body: Production alert triggered. Immediate action required.
query: index=prod ERROR OR CRITICAL | stats count by host

name: Warning - Application
query: index=app log_level=ERROR | stats count by component

name: Info - Monitoring
query: index=_internal | stats count by component | head 10

name: Daily Report
query: index=* | stats count by index | sort -count

name: Weekly Report
query: index=* | stats count by sourcetype | sort -count

name: Security Alert
email_body: Security event detected. Immediate investigation required.
query: index=security action=blocked OR action=denied | stats count by src_ip

name: Capacity Alert
query: index=metrics cpu_pct>80 OR mem_pct>80 | stats avg(cpu_pct) avg(mem_pct) by host

name: Database Alert
query: index=database status=error OR status=warning | stats count by database_name

name: Network Alert
query: index=network status=down OR latency>1000 | stats count by device
